segments.text: Hey , you wanna see a movie tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sounds like a good plan . What do you want to see ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , my girlfriend wanted to see that movie . I have to take her later so I don't want to watch it ahead of time . How about The Cube ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How scary can it be ? Come on , it'll be fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I'll give it a try .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the spirit . I'll see you tomorrow after class .
segments.speaker: S2
